creditline: Gift of Lloyd and Elizabeth Olson
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two-panel huipil, red ground with narrow white, green, blue stripes. Embroidered randa, magenta fabric appliquéd at neck opening, with additional embroidery.
medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery, appliqué
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
